Example Sentence (Chuukese): Chómmóng aramas a fen átti pwal pwan fan iten rán.
Example Sentence (English): Many people continue doing so every day.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Ewe Paipel a áiti ngeni aramas ngeni manawach.
Example Sentence (English): The Bible teaches people about life.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Osukosuk a áwora ngeni aramas chok.
Sia tongeni alapaaló ach lúkúlúk ren an met Paipel.
Example Sentence (English): We can build up our trust in what the Bible says.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Sia tongeni etittinafichi ekewe Toropwe mi Pin.
Example Sentence (English): We can carefully examine the Scriptures.

English Meaning: carefully; diligently (idiomatic use in Scripture study)
Example Sentence (Chuukese): Sia tongeni káé ewe Paipel kaiö lon ekewe Toropwe mi Pin.
Example Sentence (English): You can study the Bible carefully by examining the Scriptures.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Meinisin minne a férí epwe fis.
Example Sentence (English): Good things that are hoped for will be done.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Upwe tongeni pwisin filatá pwe epwe fis.
Example Sentence (English): We can decide so that it will happen.

Part of Speech: Meinisin minne a férí epwe fis.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Ewe Samol i ewe Emen mi Unusen Tekia.
Example Sentence (English): Jehovah is the Most High God.
They will be able to understand.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Ka éwe met ika éwe fil.
Met a sókkóló ren ewe puken.
Example Sentence (English): The matter is different from the book.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Án Paipel epwe tongeni usun mwich.
Example Sentence (English): From the Bible you can learn about life.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Met Paipel epwe alisi ngeni aramas.
Example Sentence (English): What the Bible says instructs people.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Lon ewe Paipel ekkewe met epwe fis.
Example Sentence (English): In the Bible these things will happen.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Met Paipel a apasa epwe fis.
Example Sentence (English): What the Bible says will happen.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Ewe puken a apasa ewe mettoch.

Example Sentence (English): About the future it will happen.
The things that are spoken will occur.

Example Sentence (Chuukese): Repwe mefi pwe repwe kaiö lon ewe puken.
Lon ekewe Toropwe ra tongeni fis.
Example Sentence (English): In the Scriptures they could see.
Study the Bible about the future.
You will be able to decide.
You will decide about the matter.
You will believe what the Bible says.
About the future it will happen.
About the future the Bible speaks.
